title: The Lost History of Cybernetics
itunes:title: The Lost History of Cybernetics
description:
June and Kyle from the General intellect Unit podcast join Chris to explain what cybernetics is, its history in the Chilean revolution, and how we can use it to build a better socialist world.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
